resources:
Food Truck Settings About Help Logout Favorites Trucks Near Me Food Truck Finders Always know where your favorite food trucks are with the FoodTruck Finder! We allow you to see what is near along with tracking your favorite trucks around the city. Simply add your favorites and set a range. We will let you know as soon as your tasty favorites are close enough to enjoy Favorites NearMe Find Food Trucks Near You Right Now! Use our map to see what trucks are currently around you. As different trucks come into the area or open for the day, the map will update to show their current location. Check now to see if you are just mere feet from your next delicious meal. Follow your favorites by adding them to your personalized list! distance Setting Help About Map How many miles away? The Food Truck Finder was created to help hungry people keep in touch with their local food truck, wherever they may be. This application allows user to add favorites, search by food type, location or cost. Additionally, it can also send out notification whenever a certain food truck is within a preset distance.

 Created by: Dustin Allderedge, Israel McCulley, Leaf Lockwood

 Version: 1.00.03

 Published: 10/24/2016

 Company: University of Phoenix If Food Truck Finder is not working please try “Force Closing” it and restarting the application.


Contact information 
Phone Number: 425.555.1699 
Email: Learningteam@Foodtruck.com 
Address: 123 Fake Street Seattle, WA HELP TOPICS
////////////////////////////expandableTextView strings ///////////////////////////////////////// I CANNOT FIND THE FOOD TRUCK THAT I AM LOOKING FOR: If you cannot find the food truck that you are looking for, there may be a solution here. here is where the text would appear that would have solutions to the issue that you are experiencing. WHY ARE MY PREFERENCES NOT WORKING? If you are experiencing issues with your preferences not working, there may be a solution here. here is where the text would appear that would have solutions to the issue that you are experiencing. WHY CAN'T I FIND A GOOD MAN? If you are experiencing issues with finding a good man, we are sorry, there are no solutions for that in this app. You may try using a dating app or other application for singles. The problem may also be your face, in which case we also cannot help you. Many issues in the app can be solved by closing and restarting the app or restarting your mobile device. If restarting your mobile device does not work, we suggest exploring the FAQ below.
